tinge.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a very small amount of a colour, emotion, or quality
tinge.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: This glass has a greenish tinge.
There was a tinge of sadness in her voice.
tinge.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to give something a small amount of a particular colour, emotion, or quality
tinge.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The light of the setting sun tinges the buildings with delicate colours.
